svg.inkscape:export-filename: /home/eus/eumi/Mobile Communication Systems Engineering Lab/screamer/doc/generated/Screamer Socket Update Map.png

text.tspan: 1. All screamer functions is only aware about state. The sending and receiving functions blindly use the socket
2. Assignment 4 employs an extension to have several sockets but only one is to be utilized.
Therefore, primary_channel is used by manager to associate the socket in state with the available sockets in the DB.
The only shared data is the socket in state that is guarded by sock_lock.
The visibility arrow: A sees B
